alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:49PM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 10 inches in northeastern Natrona County. Additional accumulation of 3 to 6 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on rural areas, and any roads on Casper Mountain.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
